Module chav1961.purelib
Package chav1961.purelib.basic

Class AbstractScriptEngine

java.lang.Object
chav1961.purelib.basic.AbstractScriptEngine
All Implemented Interfaces:
BasicScriptEngineController, java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, javax.script.ScriptEngine
public abstract class AbstractScriptEngine
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.script.ScriptEngine, BasicScriptEngineController, java.io.Closeable

This class implements basic functionality for the ScriptEngine interface. It's functionality is oriented to use with the pre-compiled languages, so it has a set of specific protected methods for it:

  • beforeCompile(Reader, OutputStream) method for preparing compilation process and/or pre-processing input content
  • processLineInternal(long, int, char[], int, int) abstract method for line-by-line compilation input content
  • afterCompile(Reader, OutputStream) abstract method for creation compiled output and terminating compilation

This class also contains implementation of BasicScriptEngineController interface, oriented to use with the standard jars content. To start application code form the jars, one of the jar classes must contain a public static Object main(Bindings,String[]) method. It's location need be typed in the META-INF/manifest.mf file as a standard Attributes.Name.MAIN_CLASS key. To implement your own executable code managing, you need to override BasicScriptEngineController.download(InputStream) and BasicScriptEngineController.download(InputStream) methods from BasicScriptEngineController.download(InputStream) interface and executeInternal(String[], Bindings) method of this class. The executeInternal(String[], Bindings) method is a kernel of the execution mechanism in this implementation, and all others call it to execute code

The good examples of the child implementation for the given class is AsmScriptEngine class in this package.

This class is not thread-safe.

Since:
0.0.2
Author:
Alexander Chernomyrdin aka chav1961
See Also:
ScriptEngine, AsmScriptEngine, BasicScriptEngineController, JUnit tests
LastUpdate:
0.0.3
